name: European Pump Manufacturers Association
membership: Europump is an associate member of Orgalim, Europe's Technology Industries (mechanical, electrical, electronic and metalworking industries) and cooperates with the U.S. Hydraulic Institute.
goal:
Europump is the European Association of Pump Manufacturers, created in 1960. Our members are the National Associations representing more than 450 manufacturers in 15 EU countries, Russia, Turkey & Switzerland. Since 1993 Europump has held the formal status of an international association under Belgian law.

Europump covers a wide range of pumps for liquids used in domestic applications (water, heating) and industrial applications (oil, petroleum, water, chemicals, food, beverages, automotive, shipping, mining â€¦).

Europump is a European and international reference body for technical disciplines and a source of standards and guides for efficient and environmentally-friendly fluid pumping systems.

Europump develops appropriate programmes and tools to support the European pump industry in understanding and maintaining knowledge of fluid system technologies and the related market requirements.

Europump actively promotes energy savings and environmental integrity.

Europump maintains an open and constructive dialogue with all agencies determining or influencing the progress of its industry.

The activities of Europump are carried out by Commissions (Technical, Standards, Marketing, SMEs) with Working Groups on specific issues and a General Secretariat. The work is done by company and association experts on a voluntary basis. The secretariat staff is shared with other associations.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
